__e: You know... them beeves of yours, they wouldn't even have fed a hungry dog.
What I'm saying is, I don't care nothing about cows. Just care about what I put inside my body.
Those cows are worth much more, and you know it.
And there was cows and all that stuff.
I don't know why, when I heard of a knight who went to save a princess for an acre of land and two cows, I thought: "who would be fool enough to do that?"
